orbit.settings.orbitStartOrientation.hin: The starting orientation of the orbit. Default North.
orbit.settings.orbitStartDate.name: Start Date
orbit.settings.orbitStartDateDay.hint: The starting day of the orbit. Default 1.
orbit.settings.orbitStartDateMonth.hint: The starting month of the orbit. Default 1.
orbit.settings.orbitStartDateYear.hint: The starting year of the orbit. Default 0.
orbit.settings.orbitSpeed.name: Orbit Speed
orbit.settings.orbitSpeed.hint: The speed of the orbit, hours per 60sec. Default 24h.
orbit.tokenConfig.enableOrbit.name: Enable Orbit
orbit.tokenConfig.makeOrbit.name: Enable Orbit Path.
orbit.tokenConfig.orbitPathName.name: Orbit Path Name.
orbit.tokenConfig.orbitNodeIndex.name: Orbit Node.
